title: The Meet (Person of Interest)(1 x 6)
author: Person of Interest Highlights
comment: You can see how John actually changes his voice in tone and tempo here to match a more friendly voice. Unfortunately, it doesn't work, but it's still great to see Caviezel's brilliant performance in POI.
Just weird to hear a different voice tone / accent for Reese in this scene(s) at least while he is with Zoë

It seems that they don't make tv shows like this one anymore ! There is not one tv show after ' person of interest ' i like . 
Please Hollywood , make more tv shows like ' Person of Interest ' or like ' Fringe ' or like ' Continuum ' or ' Breaking bad ' or ' X-Files ' !!!
So this is what Abby Griffing did before she went to live on the Ark
description: John saves Zoe from an ambush. John also says "You like jazz?" so that's pretty impressive.
